game.name: 白纸星途:民国乱世歌姬
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Oriental Songstress1930"​ is a FMV. Players will participate from a third-person perspective in the growth process of the historical figure "Zhou Xuan" . Explore Zhou Xuan’s story through extensive branching plots, item collection, and experience and collect the storylines of multiple characters.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Oriental Songstress1930"​ is a FMV. Players will participate from a third-person perspective in the growth process of the historical figure "Zhou Xuan" . Explore Zhou Xuan’s story through extensive branching plots, item collection, and experience and collect the storylines of multiple characters.
